name: Asilo Royale
description:
Prototype.

It was a sunny afternoon when the blood reached Asilo Royale, a quiet nursing home... It all started as a simple dispute for the remote control of the TV and ended with a fight to the death between furious old people.

Asylum Royale is a top down view  shooter videogame in which you will have to control an old man/woman and beat your rivals to take the remote control. Multiplayer game prototype, in which for the moment you can arm yourself, earn points collecting pills and killing enemies in one of the three available offile missions.

Controls:

[W] - UP

[S] - DOWN

[A] - LEFT

[D] - RIGTH

[R] - RECHARGE

[RIGTH CLICK] - SHOOT
